<< ge Operators horzcat >>

gt

greater than, > operator.

Syntax

C = gt(A, B)
C = (A > B)

Input argument

A

a variable

B

a variable

Output argument

C

result of A > B

Description

C = gt(A, B) returns a logical array with elements set to logical true A is greater than B.

Examples

eye(2,2) > ones(2, 2)


0 > i


'Nelson' > 'Noslen'


'Nelson' > 'l'


gt(0.8 - 0.6 - 0.2, 0)

See also

ne, lt, le, ge, eq.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
